app.description: You can get your luck of the day as a percentage by this app. Cost : 5.0 by Thulasya
app.help: Press the send button

app.description: This application gives you the lucky number of your name and lucky number of your birthday. Cost : 5.0 by Charitha
app.help: Type your name, date of birth,month of birth and year of birth separated by spaces and press send

app.description: This application predicts the number of babies you and your partner will have in the future!! Cost : 5.0 by Gayan
app.help: Type your name and your partner's name separated by a space and press send.

app.description: This is a cool tool that measures love between you and your dream mate & measures friendship between you and your friend. try Now !!! Cost : 5.0 by Roshan
app.help: Type your name your partner's or friend's name and love/friend seperated by a spaces and press send. Press Help for help.

app.description: Get your daily 'Manamalakama' percentage with this fun application. Cost : 5.0 by Mithra
app.help: To get quote 'Manamalakama' percentage press Request button

app.description: An application to calculate Life number, Destiny number, Soul number, and Birth number from Date of Birth and Full Name. Cost : 5.0 by Priyantha
app.help: Type your date of birth (Eg.1987-12-28) and fullname seperated by spaces and press send

app.description: Users can either receive love quotes from this application in both Sinhala and English Languages or send a love quote to the application so that it will be shared with the other users of this application. Cost : 5.0 by Anuja
app.help: To get quote press Get, to add quote type your quote in the given field and press Add button

app.description: This is a subscription service which provides a JOKE via a SMS everyday in Sinhala. Cost : 30.0 by S.Mutukuda
app.help: To register press Register button, to unregister Press Unregister button

app.description: This is the mobile version of well known Saththara Gurunnanse of Facebook.Through this app users can ask saththara from Saththara Gurunnanse and get funny predictions from him. Cost : 5.0 by Sachiths
app.help: You can ask Saththara by entering your name in the given field and pressing the send button.

app.description: This application gives you the satstare for the day. Cost : 5.0 by Mithra
app.help: To know the Dawase Sastare press Request button

app.description: Do you want to know the name of your future partner? Cost : 5.0 by Madura
app.help: Type BOY/GIRL and your birth day seperated by space and press send button

app.description: This application calculates friendship percentage between two friends. Cost : 5.0 by Charitha
app.help: To get the friendship percentage type the two names in the text field seperating them by a space and press the send button.

app.description: Find out what your birthday tells about your character and the gem-stone associated with your month of birth. Cost : 5.0 by Mithra
app.help: Type month of birth and date of birth seperated by a space and press send.

app.description: ChatRooms aims to provide a chat forum for Sri lankans from every part of Sri Lanka to chat,share ideas and make new friendship through SMS. Cost : 30.0 by Tharakaw
app.help: To register press the register button.To chat type the chat message in the text field and press send.For help press help button.

app.description: This is an SMS based Fun Application. To use this Application, Users can compose SMS message with any kind of problem in Sinhala or English. Cost : 5.0 by Harshs
app.help: To register press the register button.To chat type the chat message in the text field and press send.For help press help button.

app.description: Subscribe to Daily jokes and have your day filled with laughter! Rs. 1 per SMS. Cost : 5.0 by Etisalat
app.help: To register press the register button.To deregister press deregister button.

app.description: To know the name of your today's dream Girl Just press the find button. Cost : 5.0 by Shanukap
app.help: Press the find button to find your dream girl.

app.description: This is a subscription service which provides a JOKE via a SMS everyday in English. Cost : 30.0 by S.Muthukuda
app.help: Press Register button to register and Unregister button to unregister.

app.description: This application sends you messages relevant to the following categories: New Year, Awurudu, Love, Birthday, Valentine, Friend (or Friendship), Vesak, Poson, Xmas and Fun. Cost : 5.0 by Bathiya
app.help: Type the category in the given field and press send button.

app.description: This application can help to stay in touch with your favourite Twitter friends. Cost : 30.0 by Libor
app.help: To register, hit the Register button. For help, press the Help button.

app.description: Yalu is introducing a revolutionised way of chatting with finding a partner for you and letting you to chat with him/her instantly. Cost : 30.0 by Arunoda Susiripala
app.help: To register with Yalu press the Register button. To start chat type in the text field and press the Send Message button. Need help? Press the Help button.

app.description: This application sends 'Short and Funny' quotes for each user request. Cost : 5.0 by Channa
app.help: Press the Request button to get fun quotes.

app.description: Stay up to date with the Latest Technology News across the world. This application gives technology news for hardware, software, gadgets, mobile phones, etc. Cost : 30.0 by Haneez
app.help: To register press the Register button. To deregister press the Unregister button.

app.description: Word Puzzle is a SMS based word game with lot of features. Users can get marks by identifying the puzzled words with the help of the given meaning for each word. This game gives you the option to chose the game mode (hard or easy). Hard mode gives more marks than the easy mode and the user is provided with 3 trials to guess a word. If the user is unable to identify the word with in the three trials they will lose marks. Levels will be updated according to the marks scored. From level to level the the game will be more difficult and indeed exciting! Users can check their ranks among the other players. Cost : 5.0 by tharindud
app.help: To register hit the Register button. To dergister hit the Unregister button. To join the game press the Join button. To start the game press the Start button. To guess a puzzled word type the guessed word in the text field and press the Send Word button. To check the rank press the View Rank button. To Change the mode press the Change Mode button. To get help type press the Help button. To change the nick name press the Change Nickname button.
app.fields: REG PZL,UNREG PZL,PZL JOIN,PZL START,PZL WORD $word,PZL RANK,PZL MODE,PZL HELP,PZL CHNG

app.description: This is a SMS based group messaging application. Users can Create groups, join groups and can send SMS's to the whole group .This is a registration base application. Cost : 30.0 by Tharaka
app.help: To register press Register button. To create group press create button. To join a group type the group name and press add. To send sms type group name and message and press send. To deregister press unregister button. For help press help button
app.fields: REG GSMS,GSMS CREATE,GSMS ADD,GSMS SMS2 $msg,UNREG GSMS,GSMS HELP

app.description: You can follow the updates of your school matches and your favorite sports tournaments via SMS alerts. This application can give all types of information. Cost : 30.0 by CheerYourTeam.com
app.help: 1. Particular school's sports updates To subscribe type the school name in the textfield and press the Register School button. To unsubscribe type the school name and pressthe Unregister School button. 2.Sports updates of a particular sport regardless of schools: To subscribe type the name of the sport and press the Register Sport button.To unsubscribe type the sport name and press Unregister Sport. 3. All sports updates of all the schools To subscribe press Register School. To unsubscribe press Unregister School.

app.description: This is a funny application that you can use in order to find your brain power.By using this you can simply find out how intelligent you are? Cost : 5.0 by Milindag
app.help: Type your name in the given field and press send.

app.description: SMS based application to retrieve instant info from the cinema world. Cost : 5.0 by Haneez
app.help: To use type the city name in the text field and press the Send button, press the Help button for help.

app.description: Match your real love.Will send a reply with the matching percentage, Cost : 5.0 by hSenidMobile
app.help: To use this app type the two names in the text field seperating them by a space and press the Send button

app.description: New Movie and music releases around the world can be instantly informed via sms. Cost : 30.0 by Chinthaka
app.help: To register, press the Register button. To unregister, press the Unregister button.

app.description: This application gives the latest Business News alerts. Cost : 30.0 by Haneez
app.help: To register with the service press the Register button. To deregister press the Unregister button.

app.description: CrickAt Mobile for cricket lovers. Cost : 30.0 by Shayanthan
app.help: Press Register to registerand Unregister to unregister.

app.description: Receive a Hadees daily from most famous books (Ex.Buhari, Muslim etc). Cost : 30.0 by Suhail Jamaldeen
app.help: Press Register to subscribe. To deregister type press the Unregister button.

app.description: Application will send fertile period when the user send the last menstrual date with the menstrual period. Cost : 5.0 by kumudul
app.help: Type <menstrual date(YYYY/MM/DD)><menstrual period> and press the Send Details button. For help press the Help button. E.g. If your menstrual date is 20011/01/02 and menstrual period is 31 then type 2011/01/02<space>31.

app.description: This is a subscription based game application which can be played through SMS. To Register with the Game press the REG KATA Button. Cost : 30.0 by madura
app.help: To join with a game type your nickname and press Join For help press the Help button. To play the game type your choice and press the Send button.

app.description: This is a penalty shoot out game, where you can either choose to strike or defend the goal. Cost : 5.0 by hSenidMobile
app.help: To register press Register. To get help message press Help

app.description: VOG SMS is a SMS alert system. Pregnant mothers can register to the system by sending SMS specifying the LRMP (Last Regular Menstrual Period) date. The system automatically calculate the pregnancy period and sends alerts every day morning which correspond to that time period. Cost : 30.0 by kumudul
app.help: To register type LRMP date as yyyy-mm-dd and press Register Ex: 2010-12-21 For help press Help To deregister press Unregister LRMP : Last Regular Menstrual Period. For more details www.vog.lk

app.description: This is a Playable Tic-Tac-Toe Game via SMS. Two players can play the game in normal way.Connecting (known) two players to play Tic-Tac-Toe game in Live through short messages. Many pair of players can play Tic-Tac-Toe in one Instance. Cost : 30.0 by HarshaDura
app.help: To Register press Register For help press Help To deregister press Unregister. For more Details Visit :http://www.ticapp.tk

app.description: Match horoscope according to traditional Visi Porondam.We send the number of good, medium and bad porondam.Cost : 5.0 by Chandana
app.help: Type girls birth information first and boys birth information second,which including birthday birth time and location, and press the Send button.

app.description: Bhasha English2Sinhala is a SMS based English to Sinhala Dictionary.You can simply send any English word(s) to this dictionary & receive Sinhala translation(s) as a reply. Cost : 5.0 by Bhasha
app.help: To use, type any English word in the text area and press the Send Word button.

app.description: Subscribe to the Daily Mirror news service from the reliable publication Wijaya Newspapers. Rs.30 per month, 1st 15 days FREE. Cost : 30.0 by Etisalat
app.help: To subscribe press the Register button; To deregister press the Unregister button.

app.description: Subscribe to daily alerts and updates of the English Premier League matches. Rs.30 per month. Cost : 1.0 by Etisalat
app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.description: Recieve cricket updates and alerts in sinhala language for all matches played by Sri Lanka. Rs 5 per match. Cost : 5.0 by Etisalat
app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.description: Get the latest international cricket updates with this application. Cost : 5.0 by Charitha
app.help: Press the Get Update button to get the latestcricket updates.

app.description: cricnews is a subscription based application.You will recieve criket updates on your mobile."Keep In Touch with Gentlemen's Game" Cost : 30.0 by Roshan
app.help: Press Register to registerand Unregister to unregister. Press Help for help.

app.description: Application to receive stock exchange details. Cost : 30.0 by Jason Jebanesan
app.help: Register to the Application : press RegisterUnregister from the Application : press Unregister.Press Help for help.

app.description: This application will help to track the users expenses and produce them detailed reports. Cost : 30.0 by Amila Silva
app.help: Press Register to register and Unregisterto unregister. Type an amount and hit Add to add an expense. Press Total to get total expenses of the current month. Press Types to list down the available Expense Types. Type <date><space><email address> and press Report to post the expense report of the given month. Press About to get the detail of the app developer. Press Help to get and quick help.
app.fields: REG ME,UNREG ME,ME ADD $details,ME TOTAL,ME TYPES,ME RPT $details,ME ABT,ME HELP

app.description: Sale is the smartest way to meet buyers and sellers.It allows sellers to advertise their products instantly.Sellers can create their own groups.Buyers can joined to groups of their favourite sellers.Then they get to know whenever the seller advertise products via Sale.Same time sellers can advertise their products to all the Sale subscribers. Cost : 30.0 by Manuja Jayamanne
app.help: Register to the Application : press RegisterUnregister from the Application : press Unregister.Unregister from common group : Press Unregister Common.Re-register to common group : Press Register Common.
app.fields: REG SALE,UNREG SALE,SALE REG COM,SALE UNREG COM

app.description: mMart is your SMS classifieds to buy & sell your mobile phones!.It's a revolutionary method for a seller to advertise and for a buyer to query phones either based on price or model.Brand name,model and contact number must be single words.eg: sonyericsson. Cost : 5.0 by sureshs
app.help: To Sell type <Phone-brand><space><Phone model><space><Price><space><Contact-no> and press Sell. To Search by model type <Brand><space><Model> and press Search ModelTo Search by price type <Brand><space><Price> and press Search PriceTo Cancel a selling type the reference id and press Cancel.

app.description: Within a period of time users can bid for an item using sms. The lowest and the unique bid at the end of the auction time will win the current prize. Prizes will be announced from time to time. Cost : 5.0 by Ashen Gomez
app.help: To place a bid type your bid and hit the Bid button. Press Helpfor help.

app.description: Attention! Obesity can kill! Being overweight can lead to Diabetes, Hypertension & Kidney Failure. Don't be a statistic! Use our BMI Calculator & Stay Healthy! Cost : 5.0 by Lanka Doctor
app.help: Type <weight in KG><space><height in cm><space><sex 'M' if you are male or 'F' if you are female> and press Calculate to calculate your BMI. Press Help for help.

app.description: This application provides the contact details and addresses of all the private hospitals and nursing homes which are registered under Association of Private Hospitals and Nursing homes. Cost : 5.0 by Roshan
app.help: Type the name of the hospital and press Get Detailsto get details. Press Help for help.

app.description: Sexual Health Quiz is a mobile health education game. Cost : 30.0 by Roshan
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Join to join with thequiz.

app.description: Receive results of all types of lotteries daily. Enjoy the first week for free, after that only Rs.7 per week. Cost : 7.0 by Etisalat
app.help: Press Register to subscribe, and Stop to deregister.

app.description: Using this application you can retrieve details of the most important places located around Colombo. Cost : 5.0 by Roshan
app.help: 1) Type location name and press Get Details if you know the location. 2) Type the category and press Get Details to see the available categories of locations 3) Type category<space>LOC to see all the locations available for a certain category. 4) Press Help for help.

app.description: Get the time difference between the GMT and the city. Cost : 5.0 by hSenidMobile
app.help: Type the name of the city and press Get Difference to check the differencebetween the GMT and the city.

app.description: This is an useful application for Muslim community, which will send prayer times on demand. Cost : 5.0 by Haneez
app.help: Press the Get Times button.

app.description: An application to retrieve Exchange rates. To get the LKR value type MONEY<space><amount><space><currency> or To get other currency value type MONEY<space><amount><space><currency1><space>TO<space><currency2> and send to 4499. For help type MONEY<space>HELP and send to 4499. Cost : 5.0 by Haneez
app.help: To get LKR value type the amount<space>currency and press LKR.To get other currencies, type <amount><space><currency1><space>TO<space><currency2> and hitOther. For help, press the Help button.

app.description: This application sends fun facts everyday to its users. Cost : 30.0 by Haneez
app.help: To register with this service press the Register button. To deregister press the Unregister button.

app.description: This application gives the holidays related to that month. Cost : 5.0 by Sudeera
app.help: Type the month and press the Get Holidays button.

app.description: Now for the first time in Sri Lanka, you can search You can search Wikipedia unlimited number of times for just Rs.30 per month. Cost : 30.0 by Bhasha
app.help: Press Register to register. Then type your search term and hit Search to search Wikipedia.

app.description: Saheeh Hadees.Quotes from the Quran.Islamic Thoughts.Occasional Duas. Reminder for important days in Islam. Cost : 30.0 by Ijas Ahmed
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Unregister to unregister.Press Help for help.

app.description: Get instruction on which bus to take when start and destination are given or get the bus path when the bus route number is given. Cost : 5.0 by Jason Jebanesa
app.help: Type the place you want to take the bus from followed by a spaceand followed by where you want to go and hit Get Details. Or type the route number and hit Get Details.

app.description: This simple app gives you access to hundreds of unusual names to suit your male/female puppies. You can also view a description given to each name! Cost : 5.0 by gimasha
app.help: Press Male to get male names, Female to get female names.Press More Male or More Female to get more names. Type a particular nameand press the Description button to get a description on that name.
app.fields: DOG M,DOG F,DOG M MORE,DOG F MORE,DOG TAG $name

app.description: This application gives the results of Sri Lankan Sweeps (Lottery). Cost : 5.0 by priyantha
app.help: Type the draw number and press Get Result to get the latestresult to a given draw number. Type the draw number followed by a spaceand the sweep number to give the result of a particular sweep and draw number. Type the name of a sweep and press Get Result to get the latest result of that sweep.

app.description: Verse for the day is an application which sends meaningful and inspirational Bible verse to all who have registered. Cost : 30.0 by Jason Jebanesan
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Unregister to unregister.

app.description: This application gives the Postal Code. District and Province of any given City. Cost : 5.0 by priyantha
app.help: Type the name of the Hospital in the text field and press the button to send the message.

app.description: Application to receive a daily verse from Bhagavan Sri Sathya Sai Baba. Cost : 30.0 by priyantha
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Unregister to unregister.

app.description: Application to receive a daily verse from The Dhammapada as per the translation of Acharya Buddharakkitha. All proceeds received by the developer for this application will be given out for charity. Cost : 30.0 by priyantha
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Unregister to unregister.

app.help: Press Register to register. Press Help for help.

app.description: Subscribe to cricket updates and alerts on all International matches played other than Srilanka. 30 cents per receiving SMS. Cost : 0.30 by Etisalat
app.help: Press the Register button to register and the Unregister button to unregister.

app.description: This application can help you to get info about artists, their albums and songs including lyrics. Cost : 30.0 by Libor
app.help: Press Register to register. Press Help for help.

app.description: This application gives you greeting messages such as Love, Friendship, Good morning, Good night and wishes for special occasions such as New year, X’ mas,and Birthdays. Cost 5.0 by mithra
app.help: Press the relevant button to get greetings related to it.

app.description: Send quick email message using SMS messages Cost : 5.0 by hSenidMobile
app.help: To send an email type <Email Address><space><message> and press Send.

app.description: Get the Rahukalaya for the day. Cost : 5.0 by hSenidMobile
app.help: Press the Get Rahu Kalaya button to get the Rahu Kalaya for today.

app.description: This application provides live weather data for below cities.Ambalangoda, Anuradhapura, Avissawella, Badulla, Balangoda, Battaramulla,Batticaloa,Beruwala,Chilaw,Colombo,Dehiwala,Elpitiya,Galle, Gampaha,Gampola,Ja Ela,Jaffna,Kalmunai,Kalutara,Kandy,Kankesanturai, Kattankudi,Kegalla,Kotte,Kurunegala,Mannar,Matale,Matara,Matugama, Moratuwa,Nawalapitiya,Negombo,Nuwara Eliya,Panadura,Point Pedro, Polonnaruwa,Puttalam,Ragama,Ratnapura,Sri Jayavardhanapura,Trincomalee, Vavuniya,Wadduwa,Wattala,Weligama. Cost : 5.0 by Charitha

app.description: This application supplies driving instructions from origin to a destination via SMS. Cost : 5.0 by asankas
app.help: Type the place you want to take the start from followed by a spaceand followed by where you want to go and hit Get Details. To get the next set of instructions, hit the Next button.

app.description: This application sends 'Direction of the Maru' for current day or specified day. Cost : 5.0 by Channa
app.help: Press Today to get directions for today or type the date in the text field and press Other Day to get directions for a different day. To get the next set of instructions, hit the Next button.

app.description: This is a SMS based application for the share holders in CSE. User can receive the current trading details (current trade price, today highest price, today lowest price) of the companies by sending the company code(s) of one or two companies in one message. This application will enable the share holders to be on alert on the share prices of the relevant companies via the mobile phone. Cost : 5.0 by Asanka Ishara
app.help: Type company code or <company code 1><space><company code 2> and hitGet Details. Company code should be in standard format(Eg: semb.N0000).

app.description: This application gives you the address and the telephone number of the head office of any bank within Colombo along with the relevant bus rout numbers. Cost : 5.0 by dileepa

app.description: This application can be used to convert values in metric units to imperial units and vice versa. Cost : 5.0 by Roshan
app.help: kg2lb=kg to pounds,lb2kg=pounds to kg,cm2ft=cm to ft,ft2cm=feet to cm,l2gal=liters to gallons,gal2l=gallons to liters. Type the value and pressthe relevant button for conversion. Press Help for help.

In SMS Paradise you get many SMS categories such as love quotes, fun quotes, new year wishes,friendship quotes and birthday wishes. You can request for any category by sending a SMS. Cost : 5.0 by Mahesh

app.description: SMS Mania is a SMS pool. Its growing day by day. You can request the message category that you want to receive. Available SMS categories are FUN(Fun messages), BDAY(Birth day messages), COOL (Cool messages), LOVE(Love messages), GM(Good morning messages), GN(Good night messages), FRND(Messages for Friends).Cost : 5.0 by Kumudu

app.description: Application to play Spelling games at nine levels from complete beginner to most advanced.Words are given with their pronunciation to complete the missing letters.Helps to improve English spelling skills. Cost : 30.0 by priyantha
